verbs.description: [V: snapcrap] [ARG0: app] allows people to report feces found on san francisco streets a newcomer to san francisco has created a free app to make it easier for people to report poop and used needles on the city famously dirty streets sean miller 24 moved to san francisco from vermont after college last year and says he was astonished by the amount of public grime san francisco
